keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: An easy, tasty and economical all-in-one meal.

method.text: Coat the liver in the flour, shaking off any residue.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the onions and garlic until just soft.
In a large saucepan, cook the pasta in plenty of boiling water until 'al dente'. Drain well. Keep warm.
Add the liver and bacon to the frying pan and cook for 1 min. Add the mushrooms. Cook until just tender and browned.
Stir in the basil, oregano and tomato soup. Bring to the boil. Season to taste.
Toss the cream into the pasta with half the basil. Serve onto warmed plates. Top with the liver mixture. Garnish with remaining basil.

title: Liver and tomato with basil and cream pasta
